WizardUpdated on 21 Feb 2019As of this week, 16 states have sued against Trump's push for a border wall (https://www.nytimes.com/2019/02/18/us/politics/national-emergency-lawsuits-trump.html)But I believe that there are a few players who can actually benefit from this initiative if it actually happens!Companies invovled in the construction of the world may potentially benefit. Suppliers of granite, steel and other materials used to build walls. Transportation, distribution and logistics companies may also experience a jump in share prices too. For retail investors like us, we could potentially capitalise on stock price jumps for such players.There was an article written on this a while ago, but it is quite and interesting read and could be useful for some of us who are trying to capitalise on these development.
